panels.title: Rate log bytes sent per output
Top producing containers in last 24 hours
Top collected containers in last 24 hours

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (container_name, pod_name, pod_namespace) (label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(increase(log_collected_bytes_total[24h]), "container_name", "$1","containername", "(.*)"),"pod_name", "$1","podname", "(.*)"), "pod_namespace", "$1","exported_namespace", "(.*)") or increase(vector_component_received_event_bytes_total{component_type="kubernetes_logs"}[24h]))) / 1024 / 1024

panels.title: Collector buffer consuming bytes disk space on node

targets.expr: 100 * (label_replace(sum by(hostname) (vector_buffer_byte_size{component_kind='sink', buffer_type='disk'}), 'instance', '$1', 'hostname', '(.*)') / on(instance) group_left() sum by(instance) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint='/var'}))

panels.title: Collector buffer consuming % disk space on node
